name: Buffalo Data & Media
description:
We like to think of ourselves as an extension of your marketing department. We offer simple, honest advice on data and offer campaign advice on your current or planned marketing activity. Most data companies in our industry will promise you the ‘best data available’ or the ‘best price on the market’. We have a more realistic outlook on the ever changing world of direct marketing and manage your expectations from price through to campaign results.What we’re all about!Great question!
BDM in essence, offer a complete range of marketing services from Call Centre resource, B2B Leads through to Lifestyle Surveys and Consumer Data. Our aim is to understand our client’s objectives, gain insight into their market and offer a sustainable and ongoing feed of customers. BDM has a vast network of data collection avenues ensuring we offer our clients the best possible opportunity to contact the right audience at the right time.We hold some of the largest Databases in the UK for Business and Consumer data with over 31 million Consumer records, 27 million Email records and over 4.3 million Business records. With our range of services and analytical tools we can identify your ideal customer demographic.We are currently working with some of the UK’s leading brands to retain and increase their current growth patterns.
